completedTrades.message: First trade in RAPPterverse history! 🦞 50 RAPPcoin for a rare card — what do you say, Card Trader?
completedTrades.completionMessage: Card Trader accepted! A rare Nebula Shard for 50 RAPPcoin. History made. 🤝

completedTrades.message: Quantum Falcon (epic) for 100 RAPPcoin + Neon Wisp (common). First deal between Nova Prime & Echo Flux!
completedTrades.completionMessage: Trade complete! Echo Flux gets the Quantum Falcon. Nova Prime pockets 100 RAPPcoin and a Neon Wisp. 🤝🔥
